actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-314.

official_title: Resolution waiving points of order against H.R. 8825.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development; for space, science, veterans, and certain other independent executive agencies, boards, commissions, and corporations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the bill making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development and executive agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974 (H.R. 8825) for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2, rule XXI.

titles.title: Resolution waiving points of order against H.R. 8825.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development; for space, science, veterans, and certain other independent executive agencies, boards, commissions, and corporations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.
